cn.title: 关于防范 "虚假比特派官网" 的声明

message.data: 近期，经用户反馈，我们发现存在多家冒用比特派名字的骗子网站仿冒比特派 Bitpie 品牌，开展相应业务，试图骗取用户资产。
假冒比特派官网：https://www.bitpie118.com[假]、http://bitpie.org [假]http://bitpie.org [假]、www.bitpie168.vip [假]、www.bitpie18.com [假]
以上均为假官网，请大家对虚假信息予以警惕，不要在任何网站输入助记词，也不要把助记词透露给任何人，谨防资产损失。
如有问题请联系比特派官方工作人员：service@bitpie.com

en.title: Statement on preventing "false Bitpie official website"

message.data: Recently, we found that there are many fraudulent websites groups that declare themselves to Bitpie official to carry out corresponding businesses in an attempt to defraud user assets.
Fake Bitpie official website: https://www.bitpie118.com[false]、http://bitpie.org [false], www.bitpie168.vip [false], www.bitpie18.com [false]

The above are fake official websites and fake groups. Please be alert to false information. Do not enter mnemonic words on any website, and do not disclose mnemonic words to anyone to prevent asset loss.
There are the official website of Bitpie: 1.bitpie.com  2.bitpiehk.com  3.bitpie.one  4.bitpiecn.com  5.bitpieasia.com
If you have any questions, please contact us at service@bitpie.com.
